resp = client.search(
    index="my-index-000001",
    scroll="1m",
    slice={
        "id": 0,
        "max": 2
    },
    query={
        "match": {
            "message": "foo"
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

    index="my-index-000001",

    slice={
        "id": 1,
        "max": 2
